name: R5-Person-R4B-Person
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 Person into FHIR R4B

element.display: A generic person record

target.display: A generic person record
target.comment: R5 `Person` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Person`

element.display: This person's record is in active use

target.display: This person's record is in active use
target.comment: R5 `Person.active` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Person.active`

element.display: One or more addresses for the person

target.display: One or more addresses for the person
target.comment: R5 `Person.address` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Person.address`

element.display: The date on which the person was born

target.display: The date on which the person was born
target.comment: R5 `Person.birthDate` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Person.birthDate`

element.display: A language which may be used to communicate with the person about his or her health
Additional content defined by implementations
Unique id for inter-element referencing
The language which can be used to communicate with the person about his or her health
Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
Language preference indicator
Contained, inline Resources

target.display: Contained, inline Resources
target.comment: R5 `Person.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Person.contained`

element.display: Indicates if the individual is deceased or not
Additional content defined by implementations

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R5 `Person.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `Person.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `extension`

element.display: male | female | other | unknown

target.display: male | female | other | unknown
target.comment: R5 `Person.gender` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Person.gender` - gender has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/administrative-gender|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/administrative-gender|4.3.0 (Equivalent)

element.display: Logical id of this artifact

target.display: Logical id of this artifact
target.comment: R5 `Person.id` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Person.id`

element.display: A human identifier for this person

target.display: A human identifier for this person
target.comment: R5 `Person.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Person.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R5 `Person.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Person.implicitRules`

element.display: Language of the resource content

target.display: Language of the resource content
target.comment: R5 `Person.language` maps as RelatedTo to R4B `Person.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred

element.display: Link to a resource that concerns the same actual person

target.display: Link to a resource that concerns the same actual person
target.comment: R5 `Person.link` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Person.link`

element.display: level1 | level2 | level3 | level4

target.display: level1 | level2 | level3 | level4
target.comment: R5 `Person.link.assurance` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Person.link.assurance` - assurance has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/identity-assuranceLevel|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/identity-assuranceLevel|4.3.0 (Equivalent)

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R5 `Person.link.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `Person.link.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `extension`

element.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing

target.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing
target.comment: R5 `Person.link.id` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Person.link.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `Person.link.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `Person.link.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `modifierExtension`

element.display: The resource to which this actual person is associated

target.display: The resource to which this actual person is associated
target.comment: R5 `Person.link.target` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Person.link.target`

element.display: The organization that is the custodian of the person record

target.display: The organization that is the custodian of the person record
target.comment: R5 `Person.managingOrganization` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Person.managingOrganization`

element.display: Marital (civil) status of a person
Metadata about the resource

target.display: Metadata about the resource
target.comment: R5 `Person.meta` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Person.meta`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored
target.comment: R5 `Person.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `Person.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `modifierExtension`

element.display: A name associated with the person

target.display: A name associated with the person
target.comment: R5 `Person.name` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Person.name`

element.display: Image of the person

target.display: Image of the person
target.comment: R5 `Person.photo` maps as RelatedTo to R4B `Person.photo` - photo changed from array to scalar (max cardinality from * to 1); photo has change due to type change: R5 `photo` `Attachment` maps as RelatedTo for R4B `photo`

element.display: A contact detail for the person

target.display: A contact detail for the person
target.comment: R5 `Person.telecom` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Person.telecom`

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R5 `Person.text` maps as Equivalent to R4B `Person.text`
